title: Mystery skin isn't showing up
body: I bought myself a mystery skin and nothing showed up so far not even after restarting my client, nothing has showed still how do I fix this or see what skin I got?

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, you may have simply missed the notification. If you visit the store, you can hit the *Account* button at the top-right of the store (under your IP Balance) to find the tab for *Purchase History*.

Let me know if you have any further questions.
You should be able to view your recent purchases in your purchase history in the account section of the store.
